stories.title: Can a Stablecoin Be Collateralized by a Fully Decentralized, Physical Asset?
GitHub Enterprise SSO is broken, and they don't care

stories.text:
Hi,

I wondered how you discover new tools or find existing ones for your needs very quickly?

Using Google or searching in Github can become quite time consuming.

Currently I use

  - Hacker News (of course)
  - https://www.libhunt.com
  - https://sysadmin.libhunt.com
  - https://awesomeopensource.com
  - https://directory.fsf.org
  - https://repology.org
  - https://debtags.debian.org
and some YouTube Channels where sometimes tools are shown/recommended...
stories.title: Ask HN: How do you find tools?
We use Machine Learning at Dyte to scale flawlessly

stories.text:
I need a library (preferably JS / Node) to scrape article text off news websites such as:

Fox News Business Fool.com Barrons.com proactiveinvestors.co.uk forbes.com

Is there a similar algo / library that people recommend to quickly just get the text?
stories.title: Recommend me a library to extract article text off news websites?
